Nice phone, loved the design, Processor and camera are great too, Performance is great for higher end games too, the only problem is that battery drains pretty fast, for heavy use you could get a 4 hrs backup, for normal use it extends to 6 to 7 hrs, Overall liked the design and in hand feel is premium...But phone heats while shooting a video, thats a minor issue, though no lags...
